AbsolutionMinion.description: Damages enemies in an area, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the corpse will be consumed to summon a Sentinel of Absolution for a secondary duration, or to refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them.
AbsolutionMinion.name: Absolution

AbsolutionMinionEmpowered.description: Damages enemies in an area, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the corpse will be consumed to summon a Sentinel of Absolution for a secondary duration, or to refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them.
AbsolutionMinionEmpowered.name: Empowered Absolution

AbsolutionMinionVaal.description: Damages enemies in an area, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the corpse will be consumed to summon a Sentinel of Absolution for a secondary duration, or to refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them.
AbsolutionMinionVaal.name: Absolution

AbsolutionMinionVaalCascade.description: Damages enemies in an area, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the corpse will be consumed to summon a Sentinel of Absolution for a secondary duration, or to refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them.
AbsolutionMinionVaalCascade.name: Absolution Cascade

AnimateGuardianSmite.description: Performs a melee attack, and causes lightning to strike a nearby enemy, dealing damage in an area. Each target can only be hit once by this skill. Hitting an enemy grants an aura for a duration. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
AnimateGuardianSmite.name: Smite

AnimateGuardianWeapon.description: Animates a copy of your Animated Guardian's main-hand weapon to fight by your side.
AnimateGuardianWeapon.name: Animate Guardian's Weapon

AvianTornado.description: Launches an unpredictable, piercing twister projectile that moves randomly for a duration, repeatedly dealing damage to enemies it intersects.
AvianTornado.name: Twister

AxisCasterGlacialCascade.description: Icicles emerge from the ground in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area.
AxisCasterGlacialCascade.name: Glacial Cascade

AxisDoubleStrikeTrigger.description: Performs two fast strikes with a melee weapon.
AxisDoubleStrikeTrigger.name: Double Strike

AxisEnfeeble.description: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
AxisEnfeeble.name: Enfeeble

AxisTemporalChains.description: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
AxisTemporalChains.name: Temporal Chains

BanditChampionBlastRainSpectre.description: Fires arrows up in the air, to rain down in an area. Each arrow deals area damage around where it lands, and they will all overlap on the targeted location.
BanditChampionBlastRainSpectre.name: Blast Rain

BanditExplosiveArrowAtAnimationSpeed.description: Fires an arrow which acts as a short duration fuse. Applying additional arrows to an enemy extends the duration. When the target dies or the fuses expire, the arrows explode, dealing fire AoE damage to nearby enemies. The AoE radius is proportional to the number of arrows upon death.
BanditExplosiveArrowAtAnimationSpeed.name: Explosive Arrow

Barkskin.description: Adopt the power of the Viridian Wildwood, gradually covering your body in bark. Getting hit by enemy attacks causes bark to be removed. You have higher armour the more bark builds up, but higher chance to evade when less covered in bark.
Barkskin.name: Barkskin

BirdAspect.description: While active, grants the Avian's Might and Avian's Flight buffs in sequence. Avian's Might grants you and your minions a chance to deal Double Damage with hits for a duration. Avian's Flight grants you and your minions increased Movement Speed for a secondary duration.
BirdAspect.name: Aspect of the Avian

BirdmanBloodProjectileMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
BirdmanBloodProjectileMortar.name: Blood Projectile

BlinkMirrorArrowMelee.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
BlinkMirrorArrowMelee.name: Projectile Attack

BloodOffering.description: Consumes a corpse, and sacrifices a portion of your life, granting your minions life regeneration based on the life sacrificed, and a bonus to damage. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration and life regeneration for each corpse consumed.
BloodOffering.name: Blood Offering

BloodSacramentUnique.description: Channel this skill to reserve more and more of your life, building up power in a marker on the ground under you. Release to deal physical damage in an area based on how much life you reserved. Cannot be cast by Totems.
BloodSacramentUnique.name: Blood Sacrament

BoneArmour.description: Applies a buff to you and each of your minions, which will take some of the damage from enemy hits before being depleted. The buff also grants immunity to bleeding. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
BoneArmour.name: Bone Armour

BoneGolemLeapSlam.description: Jump through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
BoneGolemLeapSlam.name: Leap Slam

BoneStalkerEarthquake.description: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration. Cracks created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
BoneStalkerEarthquake.name: Earthquake

BrandDetonate.description: Overcharges your brands near the targeted area, causing them to accelerate how quickly they activate and expire. Deals damage in an area around each overcharged brand when it expires.
BrandDetonate.name: Brandsurge

BreachArc.description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies, but not immediately back. Each time the arc chains, it will also chain a secondary arc to another enemy that the main arc has not already hit, which cannot chain further.
BreachArc.name: Breach Arc

BreachCleave.description: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Only works with Axes and Swords.
BreachCleave.name: Cleave

BreachLightningWhip.description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage. If you hit an ignited enemy, will create burning ground under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.
BreachLightningWhip.name: Breach Lightning Whip

CageSpiderCycloneTriggerSandstorms.description: Damage enemies around you, then perform a spinning series of attacks as you travel to a target location. Cannot be supported by Ruthless or Multistrike.
CageSpiderCycloneTriggerSandstorms.name: Cyclone

CageSpiderSandSpark.description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
CageSpiderSandSpark.name: Sandstorm

CatAspect.description: While active, grants the Cat's Stealth and Cat's Agility buffs in sequence. Cat's Stealth increases your critical strike chance, makes you harder to see, and gives you a chance to avoid damage for a short duration. Cat's Agility increases your attack and cast speed for a longer secondary duration.
CatAspect.name: Aspect of the Cat

CatsStealthTriggeredIntimidatingCry.description: Performs a warcry, taunting nearby enemies to attack the user and exerting subsequent attacks. Grants a buff which lowers the effect of enemy physical damage reduction against your hits.
CatsStealthTriggeredIntimidatingCry.name: Intimidating Cry

ChaosDegenAuraUnique.description: Casts an aura that deals Chaos Damage over Time to nearby Enemies. This skill cannot be cast by Totems.
ChaosDegenAuraUnique.name: Death Aura

ChaosElementalCascadeSummoned.description: Icicles emerge from the ground in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area.
ChaosElementalCascadeSummoned.name: Cascade

ColdAegis.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes cold damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking cold damage from hits, or if depleted.
ColdAegis.name: Cold Aegis

CorpseWalk.description: Spawns corpses around you while you move. The corpses will be chosen from the monsters in the current area and any Spectres that have existed in this instance.
CorpseWalk.name: Corpse Walk

CrabAspect.description: While active, periodically adds Crab Barriers to you, and grants additional Physical Damage reduction for each Crab Barrier you have. All Crab Barriers are lost when you take physical damage from a hit.
CrabAspect.name: Aspect of the Crab

CreateFungalGroundOnKill.description: Creates a patch of Fungal Ground at the targeted location.
CreateFungalGroundOnKill.name: Contaminate

CreateSmokeCloud.description: Creates a Smoke Cloud in an area, which blinds enemies within it.
CreateSmokeCloud.name: Fog of War

CrucibleIceStormTrap.description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
CrucibleIceStormTrap.name: Ice Storm

CursePillar.description: Summons an effigy of Doedre, which will project auras of all the curse skill gems socketed in Doedre's Skin. These curses have less effectiveness.
CursePillar.name: Summon Doedre's Effigy

DancingDervishCycloneChannelled.description: Channel this skill to move towards a targeted location while spinning constantly attacking enemies in an area around you. While channelling this skill, you cannot be knocked back.
DancingDervishCycloneChannelled.name: Cyclone

DeathWalk.description: While you walk, this skill causes corpses near your steps to explode, dealing fire damage in an area. The explosions of the corpses are not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.
DeathWalk.name: Death Walk

DeathWish.description: As you channel this spell, it spreads its effect to more of your minions. When you stop channelling, each affected minion explodes, and this skill deals spell damage around them.  The explosion of the minion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.
DeathWish.name: Death Wish

DelveMonsterEnfeebleOnHit.description: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
DelveMonsterEnfeebleOnHit.name: Enfeeble

DemonModularBladeVortexSpectre.description: An ethereal blade spins around you for a duration, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.
DemonModularBladeVortexSpectre.name: Blade Vortex

DominatingBlowMinionCharge.description: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
DominatingBlowMinionCharge.name: Shield Charge

DropBearSummonedGroundSlam.description: The character slams the ground in front of them with a Staff, Mace or Sceptre, creating a wave that travels forward and damages enemies with an increased chance to stun.
DropBearSummonedGroundSlam.name: Ground Slam

DropBearSummonedRallyingCry.description: Performs a warcry, granting increased damage and mana regeneration to the user and nearby allies if there are nearby enemies. The damage increase is proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.
DropBearSummonedRallyingCry.name: Rallying Cry

ElementalAegis.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes elemental damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking elemental damage from hits, or if depleted.
ElementalAegis.name: Elemental Aegis

ElementalHitCloneShot.description: Each attack with this skill will choose an element at random, and will only be able to deal damage of that element. If the attack hits an enemy, it will deal damage in an area around them, with the radius being larger if that enemy is suffering from an ailment of the chosen element. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.
ElementalHitCloneShot.name: Elemental Hit

ElementalHitSkeletonKnight.description: Each attack with this skill will choose an element at random, and will only be able to deal damage of that element. If the attack hits an enemy, it will deal damage in an area around them, with the radius being larger if that enemy is suffering from an ailment of the chosen element. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.
ElementalHitSkeletonKnight.name: Elemental Hit Fire

ElementalHitSkeletonKnightIncursion.description: Each attack with this skill will choose an element at random, and will only be able to deal damage of that element. If the attack hits an enemy, it will deal damage in an area around them, with the radius being larger if that enemy is suffering from an ailment of the chosen element. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.
ElementalHitSkeletonKnightIncursion.name: Elemental Hit

EmbraceMadness.description: Grants Glorious Madness. Using this skill again will remove Glorious Madness and the Touched Debuffs it inflicts, but you will be unable to Embrace Madness again until the cooldown expires.
EmbraceMadness.name: Embrace Madness

EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.
EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit.name: Word of Blades

EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit2.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.
EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit2.name: Edict of Blades

EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit3.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.
EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit3.name: Decree of Blades

EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit4.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.
EnchantmentOfBladesOnHit4.name: Commandment of Blades

EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.
EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit.name: Word of Flames

EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit2.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.
EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit2.name: Edict of Flames

EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit3.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.
EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit3.name: Decree of Flames

EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit4.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.
EnchantmentOfFlamesOnHit4.name: Commandment of Flames

EnchantmentOfForceOnHit.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.
EnchantmentOfForceOnHit.name: Word of Force

EnchantmentOfForceOnHit2.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.
EnchantmentOfForceOnHit2.name: Edict of Force

EnchantmentOfForceOnHit3.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.
EnchantmentOfForceOnHit3.name: Decree of Force

EnchantmentOfForceOnHit4.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.
EnchantmentOfForceOnHit4.name: Commandment of Force

EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill.description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.
EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill.name: Word of Frost

EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill2.description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.
EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill2.name: Edict of Frost

EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill3.description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.
EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill3.name: Decree of Frost

EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill4.description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.
EnchantmentOfFrostOnKill4.name: Commandment of Frost

EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.
EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit.name: Word of Fury

EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit2.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.
EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit2.name: Edict of Fury

EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit3.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.
EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit3.name: Decree of Fury

EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit4.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.
EnchantmentOfFuryOnHit4.name: Commandment of Fury

EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.
EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill.name: Word of Inferno

EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill2.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.
EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill2.name: Edict of Inferno

EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill3.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.
EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill3.name: Decree of Inferno

EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill4.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.
EnchantmentOfInfernoOnKill4.name: Commandment of Inferno

EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.
EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit.name: Word of Ire

EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit2.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.
EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit2.name: Edict of Ire

EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit3.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.
EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit3.name: Decree of Ire

EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit4.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.
EnchantmentOfIreWhenHit4.name: Commandment of Ire

EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.
EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit.name: Word of Light

EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit2.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.
EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit2.name: Edict of Light

EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit3.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.
EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit3.name: Decree of Light

EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit4.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.
EnchantmentOfLightWhenCrit4.name: Commandment of Light

EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.
EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit.name: Word of Reflection

EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit2.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.
EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit2.name: Edict of Reflection

EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit3.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.
EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit3.name: Decree of Reflection

EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit4.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.
EnchantmentOfReflectionWhenHit4.name: Commandment of Reflection

EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit.description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.
EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit.name: Word of Spite

EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit2.description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.
EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit2.name: Edict of Spite

EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit3.description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.
EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit3.name: Decree of Spite

EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit4.description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.
EnchantmentOfSpiteWhenHit4.name: Commandment of Spite

EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.
EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit.name: Word of the Tempest

EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit2.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.
EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit2.name: Edict of the Tempest

EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit3.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.
EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit3.name: Decree of the Tempest

EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit4.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.
EnchantmentOfTempestOnHit4.name: Commandment of the Tempest

EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.
EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill.name: Word of the Grave

EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill2.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.
EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill2.name: Edict of the Grave

EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill3.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.
EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill3.name: Decree of the Grave

EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill4.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.
EnchantmentOfTheGraveOnKill4.name: Commandment of the Grave

EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.
EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill.name: Word of Thunder

EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill2.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.
EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill2.name: Edict of Thunder

EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill3.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.
EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill3.name: Decree of Thunder

EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill4.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.
EnchantmentOfThunderOnKill4.name: Commandment of Thunder

EnchantmentOfWarOnKill.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.
EnchantmentOfWarOnKill.name: Word of War

EnchantmentOfWarOnKill2.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.
EnchantmentOfWarOnKill2.name: Edict of War

EnchantmentOfWarOnKill3.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.
EnchantmentOfWarOnKill3.name: Decree of War

EnchantmentOfWarOnKill4.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.
EnchantmentOfWarOnKill4.name: Commandment of War

EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.
EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit.name: Word of Winter

EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit2.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.
EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit2.name: Edict of Winter

EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit3.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.
EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit3.name: Decree of Winter

EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit4.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.
EnchantmentOfWinterWhenHit4.name: Commandment of Winter

Envy.description: Casts an aura that adds chaos damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.
Envy.name: Envy

FemaleCannibalBossFireStorm.description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
FemaleCannibalBossFireStorm.name: Firestorm

FemaleCannibalBossFlameDash.description: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
FemaleCannibalBossFlameDash.name: Flame Dash

FieryImpactHeistMaceImplicit.description: Deals attack damage in an area.
FieryImpactHeistMaceImplicit.name: Fiery Impact

FireAegis.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes fire damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking fire damage from hits, or if depleted.
FireAegis.name: Fire Aegis

FireBurstOnHit.description: A burst of flame errupts from the location of a hit, dealing fire damage.
FireBurstOnHit.name: Fire Burst

FireElementalFlameRedSummoned.description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.
FireElementalFlameRedSummoned.name: Immolate

FireElementalMortarSummoned.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
FireElementalMortarSummoned.name: Magma Ball

FireMonsterWhirlingBlades.description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
FireMonsterWhirlingBlades.name: Fire Roll

FireballIncursionChaos.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
FireballIncursionChaos.name: Chaos Ball

FireballIncusionFire.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
FireballIncusionFire.name: Fireball

FireballIncusionLightning.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
FireballIncusionLightning.name: Lightning Ball

FlamebearerFlameBlue.description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.
FlamebearerFlameBlue.name: Blue Flame

Focus.description: Focus your power, granting yourself the Focused buff.
Focus.name: Focus

GhostPirateBladeVortexSpectre.description: An ethereal blade spins around you for a duration, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.
GhostPirateBladeVortexSpectre.name: Blade Vortex

GoatmanEarthquake.description: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration. Cracks created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
GoatmanEarthquake.name: Earthquake

GoatmanFireMagmaOrb.description: Lob a fiery orb that deals area damage as it hits the ground. The skill chains, bouncing forward to deal damage multiple times.
GoatmanFireMagmaOrb.name: Magma Orb

GoatmanMoltenShell.description: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. If cumulative physical damage prevented by your blocking or armour reaches a threshold, the shields explode outwards, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.
GoatmanMoltenShell.name: Molten Shell

GoreShockwave.description: Deals attack damage in an area.
GoreShockwave.name: Gore Shockwave

GuardianArc.description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies, but not immediately back. Each time the arc chains, it will also chain a secondary arc to another enemy that the main arc has not already hit, which cannot chain further.
GuardianArc.name: Arc

HalfSkeletonPuncture.description: Punctures enemies, causing a bleeding debuff, which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. Puncture works with bows, daggers, claws or swords.
HalfSkeletonPuncture.name: Puncture

HarvestRhexLeapSlam.description: Jump through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
HarvestRhexLeapSlam.name: Leap Slam

HeistThugRangedExplosiveArrow.description: Fires an arrow which will stick into an enemy or wall, and then explode, dealing area damage around it, either after a duration or when the maximum number of arrows stuck to that target is reached. If an enemy has multiple Explosive Arrows stuck in them, the first one to explode will consume the others, adding their damage to its explosion.
HeistThugRangedExplosiveArrow.name: Explosive Arrow (20 Fuses)

HellionRallyingCry.description: Performs a warcry, granting increased damage and mana regeneration to the user and nearby allies if there are nearby enemies. The damage increase is proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.
HellionRallyingCry.name: Rallying Cry

HellscapeFleshFodderArc.description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies, but not immediately back. Each time the arc chains, it will also chain a secondary arc to another enemy that the main arc has not already hit, which cannot chain further.
HellscapeFleshFodderArc.name: Scourge Arc

HeraldOfAgonyMinionCleave.description: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Only works with Axes and Swords.
HeraldOfAgonyMinionCleave.name: Cleave

HeraldOfAgonyMinionMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
HeraldOfAgonyMinionMortar.name: Mortar

HiddenBlade.description: Launches a spinning blade that deals weapon damage to enemies. If firing multiple projectiles, they will be fired in a circle.
HiddenBlade.name: Unseen Strike

HolyFireElementalFireball.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
HolyFireElementalFireball.name: Fireball

IceElementalIceCyclone.description: Damage enemies around you, then perform a spinning series of attacks as you travel to a target location. Cannot be supported by Ruthless or Multistrike.
IceElementalIceCyclone.name: Cyclone

IcestormUniqueStaff12.description: Icy bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies and chilling them, as well as causing patches of chilled ground. Skill damage is based on Intelligence.
IcestormUniqueStaff12.name: Icestorm

ImpactingSteelReload.description: Calls impale debuffs from enemies, alive or dead, in a large area around you to gain steel shards. Deals reflected damage in a smaller area around each such enemy based on the impales removed from them. Continues to grant shards over time until you reach maximum or spend them.
ImpactingSteelReload.name: Call of Steel

IncursionLeapSlamChampion.description: Jump through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
IncursionLeapSlamChampion.name: Leap Slam

KaomFireBeamTotemSpectre.description: Unleash a beam of fire that burns enemies it touches. Remaining in the beam raises the burning, adding a portion of the beam's damage in stages. Inflicts Fire Exposure at maximum stages. Enemies who leave the beam continue to burn for a duration. Increasing cast speed also increases the rate at which the beam turns.
KaomFireBeamTotemSpectre.name: Scorching Ray Totem

KaomWarriorMoltenStrike.description: Infuses your melee weapon with molten energies to attack with physical and fire damage. This attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies you hit, divided amongst all enemies hit by the strike. These will deal area attack damage to enemies where they land.
KaomWarriorMoltenStrike.name: Molten Strike

KitavaDemonCleave.description: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Only works with Axes and Swords.
KitavaDemonCleave.name: Cleave

KitavaDemonLeapSlam.description: Jump through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
KitavaDemonLeapSlam.name: Leap Slam

KitavaDemonWhirlingBlades.description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
KitavaDemonWhirlingBlades.name: Whirling Blades

KitavaSlavedriverFlameWhip.description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage. If you hit an ignited enemy, will create burning ground under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.
KitavaSlavedriverFlameWhip.name: Flame Surge

LegionTemplarJudgeBallLightning.description: Fires a slow-moving projectile that damages each enemy in an area around it repeatedly with bolts of lightning.
LegionTemplarJudgeBallLightning.name: Ball Lightning

LegionTemplarJudgeStormCall.description: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it and causing lightning strikes at any other markers you've cast.
LegionTemplarJudgeStormCall.name: Storm Call

LightningAegis.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes lightning damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking lightning damage from hits, or if depleted.
LightningAegis.name: Lightning Aegis

LightningSpell.description: A bolt of lightning strikes an area, dealing lightning damage.
LightningSpell.name: Lightning Bolt

MMSHeistRobotClockworkGolemMortarSpectre.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
MMSHeistRobotClockworkGolemMortarSpectre.name: Frost Mortar

MMSHellscapeDemonEliteTripleMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
MMSHellscapeDemonEliteTripleMortar.name: Triple Mortal

MMSHellscapeDemonEliteVomitMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
MMSHellscapeDemonEliteVomitMortar.name: Vomit Mortar

MMSPyromaniacIceMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
MMSPyromaniacIceMortar.name: Ice Mortar

Melee.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
Melee.name: Default Attack

MeleeAtAnimationSpeed.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeAtAnimationSpeed.name: Default Attack

MeleeAtAnimationSpeedChaos.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeAtAnimationSpeedChaos.name: Default Attack

MeleeAtAnimationSpeedCold.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeAtAnimationSpeedCold.name: Default Attack

MeleeAtAnimationSpeedFire.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeAtAnimationSpeedFire.name: Default Attack

MeleeAtAnimationSpeedLightning.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeAtAnimationSpeedLightning.name: Default Attack

MeleeAtAnimationSpeedUnique.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeAtAnimationSpeedUnique.name: Default Attack

MeleeCold.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeCold.name: Default Attack

MeleeEyrieArrow.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeEyrieArrow.name: Default Attack

MeleeEyrieBird.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeEyrieBird.name: Knockback Attack

MeleeKaruiArcher.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeKaruiArcher.name: Cold Arrow

MeleeUseContactPoint.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
MeleeUseContactPoint.name: Default Attack

MerveilWarp.description: Teleport to a target destination. Chilled ground is spread in an area around both where the caster was and where they teleported to.
MerveilWarp.name: Illusory Warp

MinionSacrifice.description: Permanently Afflicts any of your damageable minions in a targeted area, causing them to take physical damage over time, at an accelerating rate. Each such minion causes you to regenerate life at a rate based on the current damage of it's Affliction debuff. Afflicted Minions explode if their life is lowered to a fifth of maximum.
MinionSacrifice.name: Affliction

MonsterArc.description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies, but not immediately back. Each time the arc chains, it will also chain a secondary arc to another enemy that the main arc has not already hit, which cannot chain further.
MonsterArc.name: Arc

MonsterCausticArrow.description: Fires an arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact, and spreads caustic ground. Enemies standing on the caustic ground take chaos damage over time.
MonsterCausticArrow.name: Caustic Arrow

MonsterCausticArrowAtAnimationSpeed.description: Fires an arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact, and spreads caustic ground. Enemies standing on the caustic ground take chaos damage over time.
MonsterCausticArrowAtAnimationSpeed.name: Caustic Arrow

MonsterChanceToTemporalChainsOnHit1.description: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
MonsterChanceToTemporalChainsOnHit1.name: Temporal Chains

MonsterDischarge.description: Discharge all the character's charges to deal elemental damage to all nearby monsters.
MonsterDischarge.name: Discharge

MonsterEnduringCry.description: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the user and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction based on your endurance charges.
MonsterEnduringCry.name: Enduring Cry

MonsterFireBomb.description: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving an area of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through it.
MonsterFireBomb.name: Fire Bomb

MonsterFireballContactPos.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
MonsterFireballContactPos.name: Fireball

MonsterFlameRedCannibal.description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.
MonsterFlameRedCannibal.name: Incinerate

MonsterFlickerStrike.description: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks with a melee weapon. If no specific monster is targeted, one is picked at random. Grants a buff that increases movement speed for a duration. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.
MonsterFlickerStrike.name: Flicker Strike

MonsterIceShot.description: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target.
MonsterIceShot.name: Ice Shot

MonsterLeapSlam.description: Jump through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
MonsterLeapSlam.name: Leap Slam

MonsterLeapSlamFoothills.description: Jump through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
MonsterLeapSlamFoothills.name: Leap Slam

MonsterLesserMultiFireballSpectre.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
MonsterLesserMultiFireballSpectre.name: Lesser Multi Fireball

MonsterLesserMultiIceSpear.description: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
MonsterLesserMultiIceSpear.name: Lesser Multi Ice Spear

MonsterLightningArrow.description: Fires a charged arrow which damages enemies by causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning, which also damages a number of surrounding enemies.
MonsterLightningArrow.name: Lightning Arrow

MonsterMultiFireballSpectre.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
MonsterMultiFireballSpectre.name: Multi Fireball

MonsterMultiIceSpear.description: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
MonsterMultiIceSpear.name: Multi Ice Spear

MonsterProjectileWeakness.description: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
MonsterProjectileWeakness.name: Projectile Weakness

MonsterPuncture.description: Punctures enemies, causing a bleeding debuff, which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. Puncture works with bows, daggers, claws or swords.
MonsterPuncture.name: Puncture

MonsterRighteousFireWhileSpectred.description: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
MonsterRighteousFireWhileSpectred.name: Unrighteous Fire

MonsterShockNova.description: Casts a ring of Lightning around you, followed by a larger Lightning nova. Each effect hits enemies caught in their area with Lightning Damage.
MonsterShockNova.name: Shock Nova

MonsterSpark.description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
MonsterSpark.name: Spark

MonsterSplitFireballSpectre.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
MonsterSplitFireballSpectre.name: Split Fireball

MonsterSplitIceSpear.description: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
MonsterSplitIceSpear.name: Split Ice Spear

MonsterViperStrike.description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to chaos damage and inflicting poison which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. If dual wielding, will strike with both weapons. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.
MonsterViperStrike.name: Viper Strike

MonsterViperStrikeAtAnimationSpeed.description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to chaos damage and inflicting poison which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. If dual wielding, will strike with both weapons. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.
MonsterViperStrikeAtAnimationSpeed.name: Viper Strike

MonsterWarlordsMark.description: Curses a single enemy, giving a chance to double the duration of stuns on them. Attacking the cursed enemy will leech life and mana, stunning them will grant rage, and killing it will grant an endurance charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
MonsterWarlordsMark.name: Warlord's Mark

MotherOfFlamesMagmaOrb3.description: Lob a fiery orb that deals area damage as it hits the ground. The skill chains, bouncing forward to deal damage multiple times.
MotherOfFlamesMagmaOrb3.name: Rolling Magma

MountainGoatmanIceSpear.description: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
MountainGoatmanIceSpear.name: Ice Spear

NecromancerConductivity.description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their lightning resistance and giving them a chance to be shocked when hit.
NecromancerConductivity.name: Conductivity

NecromancerElementalWeakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
NecromancerElementalWeakness.name: Elemental Weakness

NecromancerEnfeeble.description: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
NecromancerEnfeeble.name: Enfeeble

NecromancerFlammability.description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
NecromancerFlammability.name: Flammability

NecromancerFrostbite.description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
NecromancerFrostbite.name: Frostbite

NecromancerProjectileWeakness.description: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
NecromancerProjectileWeakness.name: Projectile Weakness

NecromancerRaiseZombie.description: Raises a zombie minion from a corpse, which will follow you and attack enemies with a melee strike.
NecromancerRaiseZombie.name: Raise Zombie

NecromancerVulnerability.description: Curse all targets in an area, causing them to take increased physical damage. Attacks against the cursed enemies have a chance to inflict bleeding.
NecromancerVulnerability.name: Vulnerability

OnHitWhileCursedTriggeredCurseNova.description: Fires projectiles in all directions, converting all their physical damage to a random element, and grants a buff which makes you unaffected by curses for a duration. Removes curses on you when used.
OnHitWhileCursedTriggeredCurseNova.name: Elemental Warding

PenanceMark.description: Curses a single enemy, causing them to spawn multiple phantasms when hit. The phantasms will be allies of the marked enemy with the same monster level. They cast a projectile spell which deals physical damage, and are immune to curses and knockback. You can only have one Mark at a time.
PenanceMark.name: Penance Mark

PhysicalAegis.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes physical damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking physical damage from hits, or if depleted.
PhysicalAegis.name: Physical Aegis

PrimalAegis.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes elemental damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking elemental damage from hits, or if depleted.
PrimalAegis.name: Primal Aegis

PyroChaosFireball.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
PyroChaosFireball.name: Chaos Fireball

PyroFireball.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.
PyroFireball.name: Fireball

QueensDemand.description: Alternates triggering Flames of Judgement and Storm of Judgement
QueensDemand.name: Queen's Demand

Quieten.description: Curses all targets in an area, having no effect at first, but causing them to deal no damage once 60% of the curse's duration has expired.
Quieten.name: Pacify

RagingSpiritMeleeAttack.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
RagingSpiritMeleeAttack.name: Default Attack

RainOfArrowsCloneShot.description: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to land in sequence after a delay, starting at the targeted location and spreading outwards in all directions. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it. Half of the arrows will land directly on targets if there are targets in their range.
RainOfArrowsCloneShot.name: Rain of Arrow

Ravenous.description: Consumes a targeted corpse, granting you a buff that gives you bonuses against enemies of the same monster category as the corpse.
Ravenous.name: Ravenous

RepeatingShockwave.description: While you run, this skill creates a small explosion with each step, dealing fire damage in an area around you.
RepeatingShockwave.name: Abberath's Fury

RockGolemMinionWhirlingBlades.description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
RockGolemMinionWhirlingBlades.name: Roll

SeawitchFrostbolt.description: Fires a slow-moving projectile that pierces through enemies, dealing cold damage.
SeawitchFrostbolt.name: Frostbolt

SeawitchVulnerability.description: Curse all targets in an area, causing them to take increased physical damage. Attacks against the cursed enemies have a chance to inflict bleeding.
SeawitchVulnerability.name: Vulnerability

SecretDesecrateMonsterEarthquakeTriggere.description: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration. Cracks created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
SecretDesecrateMonsterEarthquakeTriggere.name: Earthquake

ShadeForm.description: Makes you immune to physical damage, and harder for enemies to detect, for a duration.
ShadeForm.name: Shade Form

ShieldShatter.description: Your shield shatters, dealing physical spell damage to enemies in an area, based on the shield's quality. For a short duration after this, you will be unable to block and will gain no defences from your shield, but your spells will deal added physical damage.
ShieldShatter.name: Shield Shatter

SkeletonArcherLightningArrow.description: Fires a charged arrow which damages enemies by causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning, which also damages a number of surrounding enemies.
SkeletonArcherLightningArrow.name: Lightning Arrow

SkeletonBlackAbyssBoneLance.description: Fires a projectile that will pierce through enemies to impact the ground at the targeted location, creating a Bone Archer corpse where it lands.
SkeletonBlackAbyssBoneLance.name: Unearth

SkeletonCannonMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
SkeletonCannonMortar.name: Mortar

SkeletonSoldierTornadoShot.description: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.
SkeletonSoldierTornadoShot.name: Tornado Shot

SkeletonSpark.description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
SkeletonSpark.name: Spark

SkeletonVulnerability.description: Curse all targets in an area, causing them to take increased physical damage. Attacks against the cursed enemies have a chance to inflict bleeding.
SkeletonVulnerability.name: Vulnerability

SlavedriverFlameWhip.description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage. If you hit an ignited enemy, will create burning ground under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.
SlavedriverFlameWhip.name: Lightning Surge

SolarisChampionFlameVortex.description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
SolarisChampionFlameVortex.name: Flame Vortex

SpectralSkullShieldCharge.description: Charges at an enemy, bashing it with the character's shield and striking it. This knocks it back and stuns it. Enemies in the way are pushed to the side. Damage and stun are proportional to distance travelled. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
SpectralSkullShieldCharge.name: Charge

SpiderAspect.description: While active, periodically applies a Spider's Web debuff to nearby Enemies, and Hinders them. Each Spider's Web on an Enemy increases the Damage they take. Hinder reduces their movement speed.
SpiderAspect.name: Aspect of the Spider

SpiritBurst.description: Consumes a spirit charge to fire projectiles which deals physical damage.
SpiritBurst.name: Spirit Burst

StormCascadeTriggered.description: Lightning crackles in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area.
StormCascadeTriggered.name: Storm Cascade

SummonArbalists.description: Summons Arbalist minions which use projectile attacks.
SummonArbalists.name: Summon Arbalists

SummonBeastialRhoa.description: Summons a Bestial Rhoa. In addition to its melee attack, the Bestial Rhoa uses a charge and has an aura that intimidates enemies. This minion's hits cannot be evaded. Enemies will not engage this minion directly, and they are immune to damage.
SummonBeastialRhoa.name: Summon Bestial Rhoa

SummonBeastialSnake.description: Summons a Bestial Snake. The Bestial Snake fires powerful chaos projectile attacks. This minion's hits cannot be evaded. Enemies will not engage this minion directly, and they are immune to damage.
SummonBeastialSnake.name: Summon Bestial Snake

SummonBeastialUrsa.description: Summons a Bestial Ursa. In addition to its melee attack, the Bestial Ursa uses a powerful Ground Slam and Rallying Cry. This minion's hits cannot be evaded. Enemies will not engage this minion directly, and they are immune to damage.
SummonBeastialUrsa.name: Summon Bestial Ursa

SummonEssenceSpirits.description: Summons three invulnerable spectral skulls that rush at nearby enemies and attack them rapidly. Enemies will not engage these spirits, and can pass through them.
SummonEssenceSpirits.name: Spectral Spirits

SummonGuardianRelic.description: Summons a Relic of a random element that stays near you. Depending on the element chosen, the relic minion will have an Anger, Hatred, or Wrath aura. These relics explode when they die, dealing elemental damage to enemies around them. If you already have a relic of the chosen element, its duration will be refreshed instead of summoning a new one.
SummonGuardianRelic.name: Summon Elemental Relic

SummonHarbingerOfBrutality.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. When you are near a rare or unique enemy, the minion will occasionally grant you a buff giving significantly increased Damage, Attack Speed, and Movement Speed, and reducing the Damage you take.
SummonHarbingerOfBrutality.name: Summon Harbinger of Brutality

SummonHarbingerOfBrutalityUber.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. When you are near a rare or unique enemy, the minion will occasionally grant you a buff giving significantly increased Damage, Attack Speed, and Movement Speed, reducing the Damage you take, and causing Bleeding Enemies that you Kill to Explode, dealing 10% of their maximum Life as Physical Damage.
SummonHarbingerOfBrutalityUber.name: Summon Greater Harbinger of Brutality

SummonHarbingerOfDirections.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will cast a random buff on you that grants one or all of the following: 1 additional Projectile, +1 Chain, Pierce 1 additional Target, or Projectiles Fork.
SummonHarbingerOfDirections.name: Summon Harbinger of Directions

SummonHarbingerOfDirectionsUber.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will cast a random buff on you that grants one or all of the following: Fire 2 additional Projectiles, Chain 2 additional times, Projectiles Pierce 2 additional targets, or Projectiles Fork then Fork an additional time.
SummonHarbingerOfDirectionsUber.name: Summon Greater Harbinger of Directions

SummonHarbingerOfFocus.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. While you are channelling, the minion will occasionally cast a buff on you that reduces the Damage you take, and makes you avoid all Stuns and Elemental Ailments.
SummonHarbingerOfFocus.name: Summon Harbinger of Focus

SummonHarbingerOfFocusUber.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. While you are channelling, the minion will occasionally cast a buff on you that reduces the Damage you take, makes you avoid all Stuns and Elemental Ailments, and prevents Curses affecting you.
SummonHarbingerOfFocusUber.name: Summon Greater Harbinger of Focus

SummonHarbingerOfStorms.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally apply a Chill or Shock to an enemy that chains to other nearby enemies.
SummonHarbingerOfStorms.name: Summon Harbinger of Storms

SummonHarbingerOfStormsUber.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally apply a Chill or Shock with increased effect to an enemy that chains to other nearby enemies.
SummonHarbingerOfStormsUber.name: Summon Greater Harbinger of Storms

SummonHarbingerOfTheArcane.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally cast Arcane Surge on you, granting More Spell Damage and increased Mana Regeneration.
SummonHarbingerOfTheArcane.name: Summon Harbinger of the Arcane

SummonHarbingerOfTheArcaneUber.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion has two buff spells it will cast on you: Arcane Surge, granting More Spell Damage and increased Mana Regeneration, and a buff that grants Chance to Shock and Lightning Penetration.
SummonHarbingerOfTheArcaneUber.name: Summon Greater Harbinger of the Arcane

SummonHarbingerOfTime.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally create an aura on you that increases the Action Speed of you, and all allies and enemies near you.
SummonHarbingerOfTime.name: Summon Harbinger of Time

SummonHarbingerOfTimeUber.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally create an aura on you that increases the Action Speed of you and all allies near you.
SummonHarbingerOfTimeUber.name: Summon Greater Harbinger of Time

SummonMirageChieftain.description: This skill is triggered when you use a Slam or Strike skill, and summons a Mirage Chieftain who will use that Slam or Strike skill once before dissipating.
SummonMirageChieftain.name: Tawhoa's Chosen

SummonRadiantSentinel.description: Summons a Sentinel of Radiance which follows you and attacks enemies in melee, while burning enemies around it and taking a portion of damage from hits for you. You can only have one Sentinel of Radiance.
SummonRadiantSentinel.name: Summon Sentinel of Radiance

SummonRigwaldsPack.description: Summons a spectral wolf companion that attacks nearby enemies and dies after a duration. Each spectral wolf grants you a buff that adds damage to your attacks. If you have the maximum number of them, refreshes the duration and life of an existing one instead.
SummonRigwaldsPack.name: Summon Spectral Wolf

SummonTauntingContraption.description: Summons a Taunting Contraption that taunts nearby enemies to attack it.
SummonTauntingContraption.name: Summon Taunting Contraption

SummonVoidSphere.description: Creates an orb which moves towards nearby enemies, exploding after a duration or when it gets close enough. The explosion deals cold spell damage in an area, and leaves behind a Vortex on the ground for a secondary duration which continues to deal cold damage over time and chill enemies caught in it.
SummonVoidSphere.name: Summon Volatile Anomaly

SummonedReaperMelee.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
SummonedReaperMelee.name: Default Attack

SummonedRhoaShieldCharge.description: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
SummonedRhoaShieldCharge.name: Shield Charge

SummonedSpiderViperStrike.description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to chaos damage and inflicting poison which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. If dual wielding, will strike with both weapons. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.
SummonedSpiderViperStrike.name: Viper Strike

SumonRagingSpiritMelee.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
SumonRagingSpiritMelee.name: Melee

SynthesisPhysicalTripleMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
SynthesisPhysicalTripleMortar.name: Triple Mortar

TalismanT1TemporalChains.description: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
TalismanT1TemporalChains.name: Temporal Chains

TalismanT1Vulnerability.description: Curse all targets in an area, causing them to take increased physical damage. Attacks against the cursed enemies have a chance to inflict bleeding.
TalismanT1Vulnerability.name: Vulnerability

TalismanT2EnfeebleAura.description: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
TalismanT2EnfeebleAura.name: Enfeeble

TarMortarTaster.description: Like monster mortar skill, but leaves a ground effect on impact.
TarMortarTaster.name: Tar Projectile

TentacleSmash.description: This attack causes three otherworldly tentacles to strike the ground around you, each dealing your attack damage in an area.
TentacleSmash.name: Tentacle Whip

TouchOfFire.description: Become touched by the flames of the Cleansing Fire.
TouchOfFire.name: Approaching Flames

TouchOfGod.description: The character uses their fist to slam the ground in front of them, with less attack speed, but more damage. This attack deals Lightning Damage to enemies in a large area, with a chance to Shock them. Cannot be used while wielding a Weapon. Cannot be Evaded.
TouchOfGod.name: Doryani's Touch

TriggeredBoneNova.description: Bones erupt around enemies you hit, dealing physical damage.
TriggeredBoneNova.name: Bone Nova

TriggeredConsecrate.description: Creates an area of Consecrated Ground, providing life regeneration and reducing the effect of curses for you and allies who stand in it.
TriggeredConsecrate.name: Consecrate

TriggeredIcicleNova.description: This attack fires icy projectiles in a circle around enemies you hit, dealing attack damage with all physical damage converted to cold.
TriggeredIcicleNova.name: Icicle Burst

TriggeredMoltenStrike.description: Launch molten projectiles from the point of impact, causing AoE attack damage to enemies where they land.
TriggeredMoltenStrike.name: Molten Burst

TriggeredShockedGround.description: Creates a patch of Shocked Ground in a radius around you.
TriggeredShockedGround.name: Shock Ground

TriggeredSummonGhostOnKill.description: Summons a Phantasm minion, which uses a piercing projectile spell that deals physical damage.
TriggeredSummonGhostOnKill.name: Triggered Summon Phantasm

TriggeredSummonLesserShrine.description: Creates a Lesser Shrine, which will grant a bonus when touched. The Lesser Shrine will disappear after a short duration, or when used. This skill starts on cooldown.
TriggeredSummonLesserShrine.name: Create Lesser Shrine

TriggeredSummonSpider.description: Raise two spectral spiders from each nearby corpse that will attack your enemies with Viper Strike. Each raised spider grants you increased Attack Speed and increased Damage with Poison. Enemies will not engage the spiders directly, and they are immune to damage.
TriggeredSummonSpider.name: Raise Spiders

UltimatumGuardMeleeCold.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
UltimatumGuardMeleeCold.name: Cold Arrow

UndyingWhirlingBlades.description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
UndyingWhirlingBlades.name: Whirling Blades

UniqueAnimateWeapon.description: Manifests two Dancing Dervishes to fight by your side. While a Dancing Dervish is manifested, you have Onslaught and cannot use Weapons. Cannot be supported by supports that would create other minions.
UniqueAnimateWeapon.name: Manifest Dancing Dervishes

UniqueEnchantmentOfInfernoOnCrit.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.
UniqueEnchantmentOfInfernoOnCrit.name: Commandment of Inferno

UniqueMirageWarriors.description: When you attack with The Saviour and deal a critical strike, this skill can summon a Mirage Saviour. Summoned Mirage Saviours will fight for you using whichever of your attack skills you dealt the critical strike with that caused them to be summoned. Mirage Saviours will not be resummoned using the same skills if you already have the maximum number of them.
UniqueMirageWarriors.name: Reflection

VaalAuraElementalDamageHealing.description: Casts an aura that causes taking elemental damage to heal you and nearby allies instead.
VaalAuraElementalDamageHealing.name: Gluttony of Elements

VaalDominationMelee.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.
VaalDominationMelee.name: Default Attack

VaalIncursionFirestorm.description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
VaalIncursionFirestorm.name: Firestorm

VaalincursionMortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.
VaalincursionMortar.name: Physical Mortar

VampiricIcon.description: Reserves some of your life to cause bleeding you inflict to be stronger, and grant life regeneration based on the number bleeding enemies nearby.
VampiricIcon.name: Thirst for Blood

VoidGaze.description: Applies a debuff to Enemies, removing some of their resistance to Chaos damage.
VoidGaze.name: Void Gaze

VoidShot.description: Fires an arrow which decelerates to the target location, the arrow will then become unstable and explode dealing weapon damage in an area, converting half of the physical damage to cold damage.
VoidShot.name: Void Shot

VolatileDeadChaos.description: A corpse near the targeted location explodes, dealing damage in a small area and creating an orb which moves towards nearby enemies before dealing spell damage in a larger area. The explosion of the corpse is not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.
VolatileDeadChaos.name: Stalking Pustule

WickerManMoltenStrike.description: Infuses your melee weapon with molten energies to attack with physical and fire damage. This attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies you hit, divided amongst all enemies hit by the strike. These will deal area attack damage to enemies where they land.
WickerManMoltenStrike.name: Molten Strike

WraithEtherealKnives.description: Fires an arc of knives outwards in front of the caster which deal physical damage.
WraithEtherealKnives.name: Ethereal Knives
